oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of the Bell Tower from Ave Maria Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bell Tower; Arches; Buildings; Ave Maria Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the Bell Tower and arches from Ave Maria Hall. Buckman Hall now stands where Ave Maria Hall previously did.
